name: TDPHS
description:
Hello There!

So basically after years of struggling to get myself into gamedev seriously, I finally did it! This game-wannabe is just an experimental project of mine I started out for educating myself. And it just happened that I wanted to share it with people. I know, I know. There's literally zero content in it but it's here for getting responses on the already working mechanics. Should I do as I think it's good or should I reconsider how I approach implementing mechanics? 

Fate of this project: UNKOWN
